title: For Trade: Two trimmed (I mean really trimmed) EPDG - SOLD
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: For Trade: Two trimmed (I mean really trimmed) EPDG - SOLD
posts.post_content:
I've picked up upgrades for each of these recently.  I'd like trade these for an EPDG with all four borders in tact.  Can still be trimmed, creased, writing, etc.  PM me any offers:
[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/raw-for-sale/7872/donovan-wild-bill-portrait[/IMG][IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/t206hound/raw-for-sale/7871/fiene-lou-portrait[/IMG]
